# The `TimerGroup` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timergroup">TimerGroup</a> class is used to group together related timers into a single report that is printed when the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timergroup">TimerGroup</a> is destroyed. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::TimerGroup</CodeBlock>

</IncludesList>

## Description {#details}

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timergroup">TimerGroup</a> class is used to group together related timers into a single report that is printed when the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timergroup">TimerGroup</a> is destroyed.

It is illegal to destroy a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timergroup">TimerGroup</a> object before all of the Timers in it are gone. A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timergroup">TimerGroup</a> can be specified for a newly created timer in its constructor.

Definition at line 178 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/timer-h">Timer.h</a>.

## Friends

### PrintStatisticsJSON {#a8da4024f27bb01f3cace271b7fba4722}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>friend void <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS</>}>
Print statistics in JSON format.

This does include all global timers (
<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer">Timer</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timergroup">TimerGroup</a>). <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a3b0649c72650c313a357338dcdfb64ec">Note</a> that the timers are cleared after printing and will not be printed in human readable form or in a second call of <a href="#a8da4024f27bb01f3cace271b7fba4722">PrintStatisticsJSON()</a>.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/timer-h/#l00252">252</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/timer-h">Timer.h</a>.

### clearAll() {#a5677ae12c385811e1ddcaf063644838a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void TimerGroup::clearAll ()"
  labels = {["static"]}>
Clear out all timers.

This is mostly used to disable automatic printing on shutdown, when timers have already been printed explicitly using <code>printAll</code> or <code>printJSONValues</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/timer-h/#l00234">234</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/timer-h">Timer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/timer-cpp/#l00423">423</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/timer-cpp">Timer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### constructForStatistics() {#af7e26e04ebc4659b165821aa390316a7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void TimerGroup::constructForStatistics ()"
  labels = {["static"]}>
Ensure global objects required for statistics printing are initialized.

This function is used by the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6412c3ea6550f1aeab7571b6d38a2bf3">Statistic</a> code to ensure correct order of global constructors and destructors.
